page.title: Home

blocks.content:
## Home Renovations Hamilton ðŸ”¨

Take your renovation ideas and make them into a reality with Built for You Contracting.

Thinking about your home's regular updating and maintenance can be exhausting.

There's so much to do: new shingles, fading or dilapidated siding, inadequate drainage, broken fence, and the list goes on!

With Built for You Contracting, you have a one-stop solution for all of your home's repairs and renovations.

## Hamilton Roofers ðŸ”¨

Think of how proud you will feel pulling into the driveway when your house has brand new shingles or steel roofing.

A new roof is one of the best ways to improve the curb appeal of a home, because it looks amazing.

## Hamilton, Kingston, Chatham, and Surrounding Areas ðŸ”¨

We serve the Hamilton area (based in the Delta neighbourhood), and we also serve the Kingston area East of Toronto.

## Serving Ontario for 20 Years ðŸ”¨

We've been doing roofing and home renovations in Ontario for two decades and counting, so we've got the experience to get the job done right, every time.
